title: Asian Salmon
ingredients:
- 1/4 cup honey
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons reduced sodium soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon seasoned rice vinegar
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon freshly grated ginger
- 1 teaspoon Sriracha
- Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
- 2 pounds salmon
- 2 green onions, thinly sliced
- 1/2 teaspoon sesame seeds
directions:
1. Prehead oven to 375°F (190°C)
1. Separate salmon into two portions
1. In a small bowl, combine the following
   - honey
   - garlic
   - soy sauce
   - rice vinegar
   - sesame oil
   - ginger
   - sriracha
   - pepper
1. Rip two pieces of foil large enough to create packets for each salmon piece
1. Place each salmon portion in foil
1. Fold up the four sides of foil to create walls
1. Pour in honey mixture to each foil vessel
1. Fold the walls of the foil to a sealed package

#### Cook

1. Bake about 15 minutes
1. Open packet and broil 2-3 minutes
notes: Serve with rice or quinoa and veggies

title: Sweet Lime Cumin Dressing
ingredients:
- 1/4 cup freshly squeezed lime juice, about 1 lime
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 1/2 teaspoon cumin
- 1 tablespoon finely chopped cilantro
- 1/3 cup olive oil
directions: Mix together. Add salt to taste.
notes: Chop cilantro in the food processor, it's easier.

title: Chicken Kebobs
ingredients:
- 3 chicken fillets
- 2 red bell peppers
- 2 green bell peppers
- 1 package of cherry tomatoes
- 1 red onion
- 2/3 cup extra virgin olive oil
- juice of 1 lemon
- 6 clove of garlic, chopped
- 2 tsp paprika
- 2 tsp thyme
- 4 tsp oregano
- 4 tsp salt
- 2 tsp freshly ground black pepper
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Cube chicken, peppers and onion.
   - 3 chicken fillet
   - 2 red bell peppers
   - 2 green bell peppers
   - 1 red onion
1. Mix all of the following in bowl:
   - olive oil - 2/3 cup
   - juice of 1 lemon
   - garlic - 6 clove chopped
   - 2 tsp paprika - 2 teaspoons
   - 2 tsp thyme - 2 teaspoons
   - 4 tsp oregano - 4 teaspoons
   - 4 tsp salt - 4 teaspoons
   - 2 tsp freshly ground black pepper - 2 teaspoons
1. Place chicken in a large ziplock bag.
1. Pour half of the marinade over chicken.
1. Place peppers, onion and tomatoes in a large ziplock bag.
1. Pour other half of marinade over chicken.
1. Marinade in the fridge for at least 30 minutes.
1. Soak wooden skewers in water for 30 minutes.

#### Cook

1. Heat an outdoor grill to medium-high heat.
1. Thread the chicken, peppers, onions and tomatoes on the skewers.
1. Cook skewers about 2-3 minutes on each side.

title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
- 1 large egg
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter (1 stick)
- 1/2 cup light brown sugar, packed
- 1/4 cup granulated sugar
- 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
- 1 1/2 cups old-fashioned whole rolled oats (not instant or quick cook)
- 3/4 cup all-purpose flour
- 1/2 to 1 teaspoon cinnamon, added to taste
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- pinch salt, optional and to taste
- 1 heaping cup semi-sweet chocolate chips
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Combine the following in a stand mixer:
   - 1 egg
   - butter - 1/2 cup
   - brown sugar - 1/2 cup, packed
   - granulated sugar - 1/4 cup
   - vanilla - 1 tablespoon
1. Using paddle attachment, beat on medium-high speed until creamed and well combined, about 4 minutes.
1. Scrape down the sides of the bowl then add:
   - oats - 1 1/2 cups
   - flour - 3/4 cup
   - cinnamon - 1 teaspoon
   - baking soda - 1/2 teaspoon
   - salt
1. Beat on low speed until just combined, about 1 minute.
1. Scrape down the sides of the bowl then add:
   - chocolate chips - 1 heaping cup
1. Beat on low speed until just combined, about 30 seconds.
1. Roll into 1/4 inch balls and flatten slightly.
1. Place onto plate.
1. Cover with plastic wrap.
1. Refrigerate at least 2 hours and up to 5 days.

#### Cooking

1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
1. Line baking sheet with Silpat.
1. Space dough balls about 2 inches apart.
1. Cook for ~11 minutes.
1. Let cool on baking sheet for 10 minutes before serving.

title: Brownies with Coffee Buttercream
ingredients:
#### Brownies

- 5.5 oz dark chocolate chopped (60% - 75% cocoa)
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1 tablespoon instant coffee granules
- 1 cup white sugar
- 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
- 4 large eggs
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 2/3 cup all-purpose flour spooned & leveled

#### Buttercream

- 1.5 teaspoons instant coffee granules
- 3 tablespoons whipping cream
- 1/3 cup unsalted butter softened to room temperature
- 2 cups powdered sugar sifted
directions:
#### Brownies

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper so there's an overhang around the edges.
3. In a large microwave-safe bowl, add the butter and dark chocolate.
4. Microwave for 45-second intervals on medium power, stirring between each interval until melted.
5. Whisk in the instant coffee, sugar and vanilla extract.
6. Whisk in the eggs 1 at a time until the mixture is glossy.
7. Using a spatula or wooden spoon, carefully fold in the flour and salt.
8. Pour/spoon the batter into your prepared pan and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the top looks set and an inserted toothpick comes out clean or with a few damp crumbs.
9. Cool in the pan on a wire rack before frosting.

#### Buttercream

1. In a small cup dissolve the instant coffee granules in 2 tablespoons of the whipping cream. If you prefer a stronger coffee flavor, use 1.5 teaspoons of instant coffee granules.
2. In a large bowl using a stand or hand-held electric mixer beat the butter for about 1 minute to soften. Turn the mixer down to low speed and beat in 1.5 cups of icing sugar.
3. Beat in the cream. If the frosting seems too thin or not sweet enough, beat in the remaining ½ cup powdered sugar.
4. Remove the brownies from the pan using the overhang of the parchment paper.
5. Frost the brownies with the cafe latte buttercream using a flat-edge knife. Cut into 9 or 16 squares and enjoy.
notes: Use 3 eggs if you want less fudgy brownies.

title: Veggie Chili
ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon plus 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 medium-large sweet potato
- 1 large red onion
- 4 cloves garlic
- 2 tablespoons chili powder
- 1 teaspoon ground chipotle pepper
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 3 cups vegetable stock
- 1 15-ounce cans black beans
- 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes
- 1 15-ounce can corn
- 3/4 cup dried quinoa
- 4 teaspoons lime juice
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Open and drain the following:
   - 1 15-ounce cans black beans
   - 1 15-ounce can corn
1. Peel and dice sweet potato
1. Dice red onion

#### Cook

1. Heat a large heavy bottom pot with the oil over medium high heat.
1. Cook the following for 5 minutes or until onions are translucent:
   - sweet potato, peeled and diced
   - red onion, diced
1. Stir in the following:
   - garlic - 4 cloves minced
   - chili powder - 2 tablespoons
   - chipotle pepper - 1 teaspoon
   - cumin - 1 teaspoon
   - salt - 1/4 teaspoon
1. Add the following:
   - vegetable stock - 3 cups
   - black beans, drained
   - 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes, not drained
   - 1 15ounce can corn, drained
   - 3/4 cup dried quinoa
1. Bring to a boil
1. Cover and reduce to a simmer
1. Cook 30 minutes
notes: Garnish with avocado, lime juice, and sour cream

title: Chicken and Chick Pea with Tzatziki Sauce
ingredients:
#### Tzatziki Sauce

- 1 English Cucumber, peeled
- 1 1/2 cups Whole Milk Plain Greek Yogurt
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice, freshly squeezed
- 2 cloves of garlic, peeled and minced
- 1 teaspooon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/3 cup fresh dill

#### Chicken and Chick Peas
- 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs
- 1 15.5 oz can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided
- 1 teaspoon ground coriander
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon Kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 4 pita breads
- 3/4 cup homemade Tzatkizi sauce
- 1 cup fresh arugula, rinsed and drained
- OPTIONAL Handful of fresh dill, chopped
directions:
#### Prepare Tzatziki Sauce

1. Using a shredder, shred the cucumber. Transfer it into a strainer and strain all of its juices pressing it with a rubber spatula. Set aside.
1. In a mixing bowl, whisk together yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, salt and pepper.
Using a spatula, fold in the cucumber and dill. Transfer to a bowl.
1. If you have time, cover with plastic and let it sit in the fridge for a few hours before serving.
 
#### Prepare Chicken and Chick Peas

1. Pre-heat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1. Pat-dry chicken with a sheet of paper towel. Drizzel with olive oil and sprinkle them with coriander, cumin, salt and pepper.
1. Rub all sides of the chicken and chickpeas with the spices either with your clean hands or using a spatula and/or tongs
1. Transfer the chickpeas into a bowl. Drizzel with olive oil and sprinkle them with coriander, cumin, salt and pepper. Mix with your hands so they are coated.
1. Transfer chicken and chickpeas onto the baking sheet and make sure that they are on a single layer.


#### Cook

1. Roast in the oven for 15 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked. It should register between 160-165°F when a thermometer is inserted in the middle of a thigh.
1. Let rest for 10 minutes. Cut chicken into strips.
1. When ready to assemble, lightly toast a pita bread and place it on a plate. Spread it with a few tablespoons of tzatziki sauce and top it off with chicken strips, a handful of roasted chickpeas, and arugula. If preferred, drizzle it with more Tzatziki sauce and garnish with fresh dill. Lightly sprinkle with salt and pepper.
notes:
Make sauce first so it can chill before serving. If short on time, you can also make it while the chicken and chickpeas cook. 
[Tzatziki Sauce URL](https://foolproofliving.com/make-tzatziki-sauce)

title: Cilantro Lime Chicken
ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lbs skin-on deboned chicken thighs
- 3 tablespoons olive oil
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 4 tablespoons finely chopped cilantro stems and leaves
- 2 tablespoons lime juice
- 1 tsp cumin or more to taste
- 1 teaspoon red chili flakes or more to taste
- 1/2 teaspoon salt or more to taste
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1. Whisk all the Marinade ingredients together in a big bowl, mix well. 
   - olive oil 3 tbs olive oil
   - garlicm 4 cloves
   - cilantro, 4 tbs
   - lime juice 2 tbs
   - red chili flakes 1 tsp
   - salt 1/2 tsp or more to taste
1. Add the chicken into the Marinade, stir to coat well. Marinate for 15 minutes but best for 2 hours.


#### Cook

1. Heat up a skillet and pan-fry the chicken with the skin-side down until slightly browned. Turn over and pan-fry the other side of the chicken until slightly browned.
1. Transfer the skillet into oven and bake for 20 minutes.
1. Transfer the chicken and the Marinade residual from the pan to a serving platter, discard oil, and squirt some fresh lime juice and garnish with cilantro, serve immediately.
notes: Make sure you use an oven-safe skillet or pan before baking the chicken in the oven. You may also grill the chicken. For the chicken, boneless and skinless chicken thighs are best but you can use chicken breasts as well.

title: Creamy Balsamic Viniagrette
ingredients:
- 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt
- 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar
- 2 Tablespoons olive oil
- 1 Tablespoon Dijon mustard
- 1 Tablespoon honey
- salt & pepper to taste
directions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl or jar and shake or whisk until combined and smooth. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
notes: Can be made without greek yogurt as well for a standard Balsamic Viniagrette

title: Honey Mustard Vinaigrette
ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 2 tablespoons dijon mustard
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1 lemon juiced, about 1/4 cup
- salt and pepper to taste
directions: 1. Place all ingredients in a resealable glass jar and shake well. Or place in a bowl and whisk. Check for seasoning and adjust accordingly.

title: Lemon Dill Chickpea Salad
ingredients:
- 2 15-ounce cans chickpeas or 3 cups cooked chickpeas
- 1 medium thin-skinned cucumber, often called hothouse or English
- 6 small tomatoes
- 1 1/2 ounces crubled feta cheese or goat cheese
- 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, about 1 large lemon
- 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
- 1/2 teaspoon honey
- 1/4 cup coarsely chopped fresh dill (feathery fronds and tender stems only)
- Salt and fresh ground black pepper
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Open, drain and rinse the chickpeas, and then add to a large bowl where you will also add the other ingredients.
1. Cut the cucumbers into bite-size chunks and add to large bowl.
1. Cut the tomatoes into small wedges and add to large bowl.
1. Add feta cheese to large bowl and mox everything up.
1. In a medium bowl, make the dressing. Whisk together:
   - lemon juice, 1/4 cup or about 1 lemon 
   - olive oil, 1/4 cup
   - mustard, 1 tsp
   - honey, 1/2 tsp
   - fresh dill, 1/4 cup coarsly chipped 
   - salt and pepper to taste
1. Pour dressing over the salad and mix.

title: Tomato Soup - Paleo
ingredients:
#### FOR THE TOMATOES
- 2 lbs Roma tomatoes
- 3 tbsp Olive Oil
- 1/2 tsp Salt
- 1/4 tsp Black Pepper
- 1/2 tsp Balsamic Vinegar

#### FOR THE SOUP
- 1/2 Cup chopped carrots
- 1/2 cup chopped celery
- 2 cups diced yellow onion
- 1 tbsp Garlic (2-3 cloves)
- 1/2 cup chopped fresh basil
- 1 bay leaf
- 1/2 cup Chicken Broth
- 1/2 tsp Herbs De Provence
- 1/2 tsp salt
- 1/4 tsp black pepper
- 2 tbsp butter
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Slice tomatoes in halves or quarters
1. Toss tomatoes with:
   - salt
   - pepper
   - olive
   - balsamic
1. Chop up veggies
   - carrots
   - celery
   - onion 
   - garlic
1. Prepare or gather herbs to have them ready
   - basil
   - Herbs De Provence
   - salt
   - pepper

#### Cook

1. Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C)
2. Lay tomatoes on backing sheet and roast tomatoes in the oven for 20 min
1. Add butter to large pan over medium heat
1. Add carrots, onion, celery, garlic, herbs de provence, salt, and pepper
1. Stir and saute for 10 min
1. Peel tomatoes when they are done
1. Add veggies, tomatoes and chicken broth to the crock pot
1. Stir in chopped basil and add bay leaf
1. Cook on low 5-7 hours
1. When done, remove bay leaf and blend until smooth using immersion blender or any other kind of blender
notes: Tastes really good cold warm or cold, and topped with parmesean cheese

title: Beef Stew
ingredients:
- 2 pounds beef stew meat
- 1 tsp Salt
- 1 tsp pepper
- 1 medium onion
- 2 celery ribs
- 2 to 3 cloves of garlic
- 6 oz can tomato paste
- 32 oz beef broth
- 2 Tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
- 2 cups baby carrots carrots
- 4 to 5 small red potatoes
- 1 tablespoon dried parsley
- 1 teaspoon oregano
- 1 cups frozen peas
- 1 cup frozen corn
- 1/4 cup flour
- 1/4 cup water
directions:
A 6 qt crockpot works best for this recipe

#### Prepare

1. Cut meat into bite-sized pieces
1. Cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces, about 3 cups
1. Chop carrots, celery and onion
1. Mince garlic
1. Measure out the flour and water and save for later
1. Measure out your frozen peas and corn and save for later
1. Combine beef, celery, carrots, red onion, potatoes, salt, pepper, garlic, parsley, oregano, Worcestershire sauce, beef broth, and tomato paste in the crock pot. A 6 qt crockpot works best for this stew. 

#### Cook

1. Cook on LOW for 10 hours or on HIGH for 6-7 hours.
1. Add in your frozen peas and corn 30-minutes to an hour before done and continue cooking.
1. About 30 minutes before serving, mix the flour and the water together in a small dish and pour into the crockpot. Mix until well combines. This will add a nice thickness to the stew.

title: Pesto Pork Tenderloin and Veggies
ingredients:
- 1 6 oz jar of Pesto
- 1/4 cup of Balsamic
- 1 1/2 cups Package of Grape Tomatoes
- 1 Zucchini
- 1 Yellow Summer Squash
- 1 cup Miniature Potatoes
- 1 Yellow Onion
- 1 Pork Tenderloin
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C) and ensure you have a rack positioned in the center of the oven 
1. Prepare your pork by trimming off the fat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, set aside
1. Cut potatoes into small chunks
1. Cut zucchini and yellow summer squash in 1/2 inch thick chunks
1. Cut onion into large chunks
1. Leave the grape tomatoes whole
1. Make the sauce by combining pesto and balsamic in a bowl and whisking together
1. Add potatoes and veggies to a bowl and pour in some of the sauce, just enough to cover veggies, and mix
1. Brush the rest of the sauce on the pork and rub it in
1. Spread veggies out on a baking sheet and place pork tenderloin on top


#### Cook

1. Roast the pork and vegetables for 15 minute, then use kitchen tongs to flip the tenderloins over
1. Continue to roast until the vegetables are browned and the thickest part of the pork tenderloin reaches 145°F. This will take an additional 10-15 minutes
1. Allow the pork to rest for at least 10 minutes covered in foil before transferring to a cutting board to slice. Serve with vegetables

title: Whole Wheat Blueberry Muffins
ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour
- 3/4 cup white sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 teaspoons baking powder
- 1/3 cup vegetable oil
- 1 egg
- 1/3 cup milk
- 1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce
- 1 pint fresh blueberries
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C).
1. Grease 12 muffin cups, or line with paper liners. 
1. Whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, and baking powder in a large bowl.
1. In a large bowl, mix the following: 
   - Flour - 1 1/2 cups
   - Sugar - 3/4 cup
   - Salt - 1/2 teaspoon
   - Baking Powder - 2 teaspoons
1. In a separate bowl, mix the following: 
   - Vegetable Oil - 1/3 cup
   - 1 Egg
   - Milk - 1/3 cup
   - Applesauce - 1/2 cup 
1. Stir liquid ingredients into dry until moistened.
1. Lightly stir in the blueberries. 
1. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling them 2/3 full.

#### Cook

1. Bake for 20 minutes until muffins rise and the tops are golden brown.
   - A toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin should come out clean.

title: Skillet Sheperd's Pie
ingredients:
#### Topping

- 1 1/2 lb. Yukon gold potatoes, cubed
- 1/2 cup half-and-half
- 4 tbsp. unsalted butter 
- 1 1/2 cups shredded sharp Cheddar 
- 1/4 cup minced scallions 
- Salt and cayenne pepper to taste

#### Filling

- 1 tbsp olive oil 
- 1/2 cup diced onion
- 1/2 cup diced celery
- 1/2 cup diced carrot 
- 1 tbsp minced fresh garlic 
- 1 lb. ground sirloin 
- 2 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary 
- 1 tbsp each all-purpose flour 
- 1 tbsp tomato paste
- 1/2 cup dry white
- 1 cup low-sodium beef broth 
- 1 can corn kernels
- 1 can green beans
- 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce 
- Salt and black pepper to taste
directions:
#### Cook Topping

1. Cook potatoes in a pot of boiling salted water until fork-tender, 10–12 minutes. 
   - 1 1/2 lb. Yukon gold potatoes, cubed
2. Drain potatoes; return to pot. 
3. Cook potatoes over medium-low heat, stirring, to remove excess moisture, 1–2 minutes.
4. Add half-and-half and butter, crushing with a potato masher until smooth. 
   - 1/2 cup half-and-half
   - 4 tbsp. unsalted butter 
5. Stir in cheese and scallions
   - 1 1/2 cups shredded sharp Cheddar 
   - 1/4 cup minced scallions 
6. Season potatoes with salt and cayenne.

#### Cook Filling

1. Heat oil in a 10-inch cast-iron skillet over medium. 
   - 1 tbsp olive oil 
2. Add onion, celery, carrot, and garlic; sweat until softened, 5–7 minutes. 
   - 1/2 cup diced onion
   - 1/2 cup diced celery
   - 1/2 cup diced carrot 
   - 1 tbsp minced fresh garlic 
3. Add ground sirloin, increase heat to medium-high, and cook until browned, 5–7 minutes. 
   - 1 lb. ground sirloin 
4. Stir in rosemary, flour, and tomato paste; cook 1–2 minutes.
   - 2 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary 
   - 1 tbsp each all-purpose flour 
   - 1 tbsp tomato paste
5. Deglaze skillet with wine and reduce until nearly evaporated. 
   - 1/2 cup dry white
6. Stir in broth, corn, green beans, and Worcestershire and bring to a boil. 
   - 1 cup low-sodium beef broth 
   - 1 can corn kernels
   - 1 can green beans
   - 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce 
   - Salt and black pepper to taste
7. Cook filling until liquid is nearly reduced, 7–8 minutes. 
8. Transfer skillet to a baking sheet.
9.  Preheat broiler to high with rack 6 inches from element.
10. Spread topping over filling and broil until potatoes are browned, 3–4 minutes.

title: Turkey Burgers
ingredients:
- 1 pound ground turkey
- 1 large egg
- 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
- 2 tablespoon freshly chopped parsley
- Kosher salt
- Freshly ground black pepper
- 1 tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil
directions:
#### Prepare

1. In a large bowl, mix together
   - Turkey - 1 pound
   - Breadcrumbs - 1/4 cup
   - Egg - 1 large
   - Garlic - 2 cloves, minced
   - Worcestershire sauce - 1 tablespoon
   - Parsley - 2 tablespoon
1. Season with salt and pepper
1. Form mixture into four flat patties.

#### Cook

1. In a medium skillet over medium heat, heat oil.
1. Add patties and cook until golden and cooked through, 5 minutes per side.

title: Mustard Crusted Salmon
ingredients:
- 1 pound of salmon fillets (2 servings)
- 1/4 cup toasted walnuts
- 1/4 cup toasted pecans
- 1/4 cup parmesan cheese
- 2 tablespoon mayo
- 1 1/2 tablespoon whole grain mustard
- 2 cloves fresh grated garlic
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
1. Line baking sheet with parchment paper
1. In a small bowl, combine:
   - Mayo - 2 tablespoons
   - Mustard - 1 1/2 tablespoons
   - Garlic - 2 cloves
1. Crush up:
   - Walnuts - 1/4 cup
   - Pecans - 1/4 cup
1. In a separate small bowl, combine:
   - Walnuts - 1/4 cup
   - Pecans - 1/4 cup
   - Parmesan - 1/4 cup

#### Cook

1. Place salmon on lined baking sheet
1. Coat salmon with mayo mustard mixture
1. Cover generously with crunchy cheese mixture
1. Bake for 12-15 minutes

title: 5 Ingredient Peanut Butter and Banana Bars
ingredients:
- 3 very ripe bananas
- 1 cup peanut butter
- 1/4 cup honey
- 2 cups oats
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 1 cup peanuts or however much you want
- splash of of almond milk
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
1. Line 13x9 baking dish with parchment paper.
1. Chop peanuts in food processor
   - Peanuts - 1 cup
1. In a large bowl, mix the following in this order for best results:
   - Bananas - 3 ripe and chopped
   - Honey - 1/4 cup
   - Vanilla - 1 teaspoon
   - Oats - 2 cups
   - Peanut Butter - 1 cup 
   - Almond Milk - splash
1. Turn out mixture into baking dish an spread evenly
1. Cover with chopped peanuts

#### Cook

1. Bake for 30 minutes
notes: Let cool completely before refrigerating. If warm when refrigerating, do not seal lid all the way to allow some moisture to escape.

title: Biscuits and Gravy
ingredients:
#### Biscuits

- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 tbsp baking powder
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 1 tsp salt
- 6 tbsp frozen butter
- 3/4 cup milk

#### Sausage Gravy

- 1 lb sausage
- 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 1/2 cup milk
- pinch salt and pepper
directions:
#### Prepare Biscuits

1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
2. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
3. Combine flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a large bowl and mix well
   - 2 cups all-purpose flour
   - 1 tbsp baking powder
   - 1 tbsp sugar
   - 1 tsp salt
4. Using a box grater, shred frozen butter
5. Cut shredded butter into dry mix until represents course crumbs
   - 6 tbsp frozen butter
6. Add milk, combine with a wooden spoon but do not overwork
   - 3/4 cup milk
7. Transfer your biscuit dough to a well-floured surface and use your hands to gently work the dough together. If the dough is too sticky, add flour until it is manageable.
8.  Once the dough is cohesive, fold in half over itself and use your hands to gently flatten layers together. Rotate the dough 90 degrees and fold in half again, repeating this step 5-6 times but taking care to not overwork the dough.
9.  Use your hands (do not use a rolling pin) to flatten the dough to 1" thick and lightly dust a 2 3/4" round biscuit cutter with flour.
10. Making close cuts, press the biscuit cutter straight down into the dough and drop the biscuit onto your prepared baking sheet.
11. Repeat until you have gotten as many biscuits as possible and place less than 1/2" apart on baking sheet.

#### Cook Biscuits

1. Bake for 12 minutes

#### Cook Sausage Gravy

1. Brown sausage in high wall skillet.
2. Add flour
   - 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
3. Gradually add milk
   - 2 1/2 cup milk
4. Cook until mixture comes to a boil and thickens, stirring constantly
5. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
6. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
notes: Brown the sausage before preparing the biscuit dough.

title: White Chocolate Cranberry Macadamia Cookies
ingredients:
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup packed light brown sugar
- 1/2 cup granulated sugar
- 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
- 1 egg
- 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda
- 1 cup dried cranberries, chopped
- 3/4 cup white chocolate chips
- 3/4 cup macadamia nuts, chopped
directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
- With an electric mixer, cream butter and sugars
   - 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
   - 1/2 cup packed light brown sugar
   - 1/2 cup granulated sugar
- Add vanilla and egg
   - 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
   - 1 egg
- Add in flour and baking soda until combined
   - 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
   - 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda
- Add in cranberries, white chocolate and macadamia nuts until combined
   - 1 cup dried cranberries, chopped
   - 3/4 cup white chocolate chips
   - 3/4 cup macadamia nuts, chopped
- Scoop into 2 to 3 tablespoon balls and place on baking sheet
- Cook 10-12 minutes

title: Korean Beef Rice Bowl
ingredients:
- 4 cups instant jasmine rice
- 1 teaspoon sesame oil
- 1 pound ground beef
- 3 cloves garlic, pressed
- 4 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon freshly grated ginger
- 3 tablespoons brown sugar
- a dash of sriracha hot sauce (optional)
- 1 cup carrots, cut julienne style
- chopped green onions
- toasted sesame seeds
- red pepper flakes (optional)
directions:
1. Prepare the rice according to package directions.
2. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat at add the sesame oil.
3. Add the ground beef to the hot skillet and brown until almost cooked through (about 6-10 minutes).
4. Add the garlic, soy sauce, ginger, brown sugar, and sriracha to the skillet and stir well until a small amount of sauce forms.
5. Add the carrots and cook for about 2 more minutes until the carrots soften slightly.
6. Serve the beef mixture over rice and garnish with chopped green onions, toasted sesame seeds, and a small sprinkling of red pepper flakes (garnishes optional).

title: Gnocchi Skillet with Chicken Sausage & Tomatoes
ingredients:
- 1 poundshelf-stable gnocchi
- Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
- 9 ounces chicken sausage (about 3 links)
- 1 pint cherry or grape tomatoes, sliced in half lengthwise
- 1 to 2 ounces fresh basil leaves, thinly sliced (1/2 to 1 cup loosely packed)
directions:
#### Prepare
1. Pan fry the sausage
   - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bK-4kinBb6c&ab_channel=FlavorLab
   - Heat pan with oil to medium low
   - Add sausage for about 5-7 minutes
   - Turn and leave for another 5-7 minutes
   - Remove once the sausages have reached 160°F
2. Cut sausage into 1/4 slices
3. Cut cherry tomatoes in half length wise. 

#### Cook Gnocchi
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over medium-high heat. 
2. Add the gnocchi and cook for 2 minutes or according to package directions. 
3. Drain and toss with a drizzle of olive oil.

#### Cook Skillet
1. Heat a 10-inch or larger cast iron skillet over medium heat with a light drizzle of olive oil.  
2. Add the sausages and cook until it begins to brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
3. Push the sausages into a pile at the edge of the skillet and turn the heat up to high.
4. When the skillet is quite hot, add the tomatoes, skin down, crowding them in if necessary. 
5. Cook until they are blistered, 1 to 2 minutes.
6. Stir in the sausage and cook until both tomatoes and sausage are slightly browned, about 2 minutes more.
7. Stir in gnocchi and cook just until all is combined, but the tomatoes have not broken down into sauce.
8. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the basil. 
9. Taste and season with salt and pepper.

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients:
#### Enchilada Sauce
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 1/4 cup chili powder
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1/4 teaspoon dried oregano
- 2 cups chicken stock
- fine sea salt, to taste

#### Enchiladas
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 small white onion, peeled and diced
- 1 1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, diced into small 1/2-inch pieces
- 1 (4-ounce) can diced green chiles
- sea salt and freshly-cracked black pepper
- 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
- 8 large flour tortillas
- 3 cups Mexican-blend shredded cheese

optional toppings: fresh cilantro, chopped red onions, diced avocado, avocado, sour cream, and/or crumbled cotija cheese
directions:
#### Enchilada Sauce
1. Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. 
2. Add flour and cook 1 minute, whisking constantly
3. Add chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, oregano and cook 1 minute, whisking constantly.
4. Gradually pour in the stock, whisking constantly to combine until no lumps remain.    
5. Continue cooking until the sauce reaches a simmer.
6. Reduce heat to medium-low to maintain the simmer (the sauce should continue lightly bubbling) for about 10-15 minutes, uncovered, until the sauce has slightly thickened.
7. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
 
#### Enchiladas

#### Cook 
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
2. In large sauté pan, heat oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add onion and sauté for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. 
4. Add diced chicken and green chiles, and season with a generous pinch of salt and pepper.
5. Sauté the mixture for 6-8 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until the chicken is cooked through.
6. Add in the beans and stir until evenly combined.
7. Remove pan from heat and set aside.

#### Assemble
1. set up an assembly line including: tortillas, enchilada sauce, chicken mixture, and cheese.
2. Lay out a tortilla, and spread two tablespoons of sauce over the surface of the tortilla.
3. Add a generous spoonful of the chicken mixture in a line down the center of the tortilla, then sprinkle with 1/3 cup cheese.
4. Roll up tortilla and place in a greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
5. Repeat for remaining ingredients.
6. Then spread any remaining sauce evenly over the top of the enchiladas, followed by any extra cheese.

#### Bake 
1. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes, until the enchiladas are cooked through and the tortillas are slightly crispy on the outside. 
2. Transfer the baking dish to a wire baking rack.

title: Lemon Squares
ingredients:
#### Crust
- 1 cup butter, softened
- 2 cup flour
- 1/2 cup powdered sugar

#### Lemon Curd
- 1 tablespoon flour
- 4 eggs
- 2 cup sugar
- 8 tablespoon lemon juice (fresh squeezed)
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
directions:
1. Heat oven to 350°F (175°C)
1. In stand mixer or with hand mixer, Mix butter, flour and powder sugar until crumbly
   - 1 cup butter, softened
   - 2 cup flour
   - 1/2 cup powdered sugar
1. Pat evenly in 13x9 baking dish
1. Bake for 15 minutes
1. Meanwhile, beat eggs slightly
   - 4 eggs
1. Add sugar, lemon juice, baking powder and remaining 1 T flour, stir until well mixed
   - 1 tablespoon flour
   - 2 cup sugar
   - 8 tablespoon lemon juice (fresh squeezed)
   - 1/2 teaspoon baking powder 
1. Pour egg mixture over baked crust
1. Bake an additional 40 - 50 minutes until edges well browned and center curd set
1. Sprinkle with powdered sugar

title: Rosemary Chicken with Tomato Avocado Salad
ingredients:
### Rosemary Chicken

- 2 tablespoons olive oil 
- 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary
- 1 tablespoon minced garlic
- 4 (4-ounce) chicken cutlets 
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper

### Tomato Avocado Salad

- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano
- 1 tablespoon olive oil 
- 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 2 cups grape tomatoes, halved
- 1/2 cup (2 ounces) crumbled reduced-fat feta cheese
- 1 ripe peeled avocado, chopped
directions:
### Rosemary Chicken 

#### Marinade 

- Combine olive oil, red wine vinegar, rosemary, garlic in a large heavy-duty zip-top plastic bag. 
   - Olive oil - 2 tablespoons
   - Red wine vinegar - 2 tablespoons
   - Rosemary - 1 tablespoon, chopped 
   - Garlic - 1 clove, minced
- Place chicken between 2 sheets of plastic wrap; pound to 1/4-inch thickness using a meat mallet or small heavy skillet. 
- Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper, and add to bag; seal. 
- Marinate in refrigerator 30 minutes.

#### Cooking

- Prepare grill
- Remove chicken from marinade, discarding marinade. 
- Place chicken on a grill rack coated with cooking spray. 
- Grill 3 minutes on each side or until done.

### Tomato Avocado Salad

- Combine oregano, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic in a large bowl, stirring with a whisk. 
   - Oregano - 1 tablespoon
   - Olive oil - 1 tablespoon
   - Red wine vinegar - 2 tablespoons
   - Garlic - 1 clove, minced
- Add tomato halves, cheese, and avocado; toss gently.
   - Tomatoes - 2 cups, halved
   - Feta cheese - 1/2 cup, crumbled
   - Avocado - 1, chopped

title: Turkey Chili
ingredients:
- 2 teaspoons olive oil
- 1 yellow onion
- 3 garlic cloves
- 1 medium red bell pepper
- 1 pound ground turkey
- 4 tablespoons chili powder
- 2 teaspoons ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 (28-ounce) can diced tomatoes
- 1 1/4 cups chicken broth
- 2 (15 oz) cans dark red kidney beans
- 1 (15 oz) can sweet corn
directions:
#### Prepare

1. Rinse and drain kidney beans and corn
1. Combine the following in a small bowl:
   - Chili Powder - 4 tablespoons
   - Cumin - 2 teaspoons
   - Oregano - 1 teaspoon
   - Cayenne Pepper - 1/4 teaspoon
   - Salt - 1/2 teaspoon

#### Cook

1. Place oil in a large pot and place over medium high heat.
1. Add the following and saute for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently:
   - Yellow Onion - chopped
   - Garlic - 3 cloves - minced
   - Red Bell Pepper - chopped
1. Add in ground turkey break up and cook until no longer pink.
   - Ground Turkey - 1 pound
1. Add in prepared spice mixture, mix for 30 seconds.
1. Add the following to pot:
   - Tomatoes - 28 oz can
   - Chicken Broth - 1 & 1/4 cups
   - Kidney Beans - Two 15 oz cans
   - Corn - 15 oz can
1. Bring to a boil.
1. Reduce heat and simmer for 35-40 minutes.
notes: Garnish with Fritos, shred cheese, and sour cream

title: Crispy Seasoned Chickpeas
ingredients:
- 2 (15 oz) cans of chickpeas or garbanzo beans
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- Salt to taste
- 2 or 3 teaspoons of your seasoning of choice
directions:
1. Drain and rinse chickpeas and lay them out on a towel. Place another towel on top and rub the chickpeas. Do this a couple times and remove any loose skins. Then let them air dry for 15 minutes or however long it takes to get them mostly dry (the dryer they are the crisper they get, but if you are in a hurry, they will still crisp up a bit if there is some moisture, don't worry).
2. Preheat oven to 425f.
3. Once dry, put chickpeas in a bowl and with olive oil and salt and mix until they are coated.
4. Spread out on a baking sheet and bake for 20-30 minutes or until golden brown and crispy. Dark brown means they are over done and might be too hard.
5. Once done, let them sit for a couple minutes then pour them into a bowl and coat them with seasoning.
notes:
These are best eaten within a day. Once you store them they loose some crispiness and become chewy but still delicious. Store in the fridge. 

These chickpeas will have a crunchy exterior but slightly chewy interior. For chickpeas that are crispier throughout preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and bake 45-55 min or as long as is needed. If you choose the low and slow route you can coat the chickpeas with seasoning before they go into the oven (add to bowl with olive oil and salt).

title: Sweet and Smoky Salmon Bake
ingredients:
- 2 Tbsp brown sugar
- 1/2 tsp smoked paprika
- 1/2 tsp garlic powder
- 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper
- 1 tsp kosher salt
- 1/4 tsp kosher salt
- 2 Tbsp unsalted butter
- 1/4 cup panko breadcrumbs
- 1/2 cup parsley leaves
- 1 1/2 pounds skin-on salmon
- 2 Tbsp dijon mustard
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
1. Melt butter
   - 2 Tbsp unsalted butter
1. Line a baking sheet with foil
1. Mix together the following ingredients: 
   - 2 Tbsp brown sugar
   - 1/2 tsp smoked paprika
   - 1/2 tsp garlic powder
   - 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper
   - 1 tsp kosher salt
   - freshly ground pepper
1. In a separate bowl combine the following:
   - 2 Tbsp unsalted butter, melted
   - 1/4 tsp kosher salt
   - 1/4 cup panko breadcrumbs
   - 1/2 cup parsley leaves
1. Place salmon on foil coated baking sheet, spread with dijon mustard
   - 2 Tbsp dijon mustard
1. Press brown sugar mixture all over salmon
1. Top with breadcrumb mixture
1. Bake 15-18 minutes

title: Teriyaki Chicken
ingredients:
For the sauce:
- ¼ cup soy sauce
- ½ cup water
- 2 teaspoons minced garlic
- 1 teaspoons minced ginger
- 2 tablespoons of honey
- 1 tablespoon brown sugar
- 2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon + 1 teaspoon cornstarch


For the stir fry:
- 1 1/4 lbs chicken breast cut into 1-inch pieces
- 2 cups broccoli florets
- 1 red bell pepper cut into1-inch pieces
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
- 1 tablespoon sesame seeds
directions:
For the sauce:

1. Place the soy sauce, water, garlic, ginger, honey, brown sugar and sesame oil in a small pot over medium-high heat. Cook for 2 minutes. Turn up the heat to high and bring to a boil.
2. Mix the cornstarch with 2 tablespoons of cold water until dissolved. Add the cornstarch mixture to the sauce and boil for 1-2 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Set sauce aside.


For the stir fry:

1. Heat 1 teaspoon vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the broccoli and red peppers and season with salt and pepper.
2. Cook for 4-5 minutes or until the vegetables have started to brown and soften. 
3. Add 2 tablespoons of water and cook, until water has evaporated. When your vegetables are crisp & tender, remove them from the pan and set aside; cover to keep warm.
4. Wipe out the pan. Heat the remaining 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan over high heat.
5. Place half of the chicken in the pan and season generously with salt and pepper. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Set the first batch of chicken aside and repeat the process with the rest of the chicken.
6. Add all of the chicken and vegetables back to the pan. Pour the sauce over the top and cook for 2-3 minutes over medium-high heat until warmed through.
7. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.

title: Pancakes
ingredients:
- 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
- 3 ½ teaspoons baking powder
- 1 tablespoon white sugar
- ¼ teaspoon salt, or more to taste
- 1 ¼ cups milk
- 3 tablespoons butter, melted
- 1 egg
directions:
1. Sift flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt together in a large bowl. Make a well in the center and add milk, melted butter, and egg; mix until smooth.
2. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake; cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry, about 2 to 3 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side. Repeat with remaining batter.

title: Potato Hash
ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb potatoes
- 1/2 package bacon
- 1 red bell pepper
- 1 small yellow onion
- 4 eggs
- 1 Tbsp paprika
- generous pinch of salt
- generous pinch of pepper
directions:
1. Cut the potatoes into a medium dice or about 1/2-inch cubes. Try to cut the cubes as evenly as possible so that they all cook at the same rate.
2. Cut the pepper and onion in a small dice, or about 1/4-inch pieces.
3. Dice the bacon into 1/2-inch pieces.
4. Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C).
5. Add the diced bacon to a large, oven-proof skillet or cast iron pan. Turn the heat onto medium.
6. Cook, stirring often, until the bacon is just crisp, about 7-10 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon to a paper-towel-lined plate and set aside.
7. Carefully drain all but 2 tablespoons of the bacon grease from the pan and return the pan to the stove. Increase the heat to medium-high.
8. Add the potatoes and cook 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
9. Stir in the bell pepper and onion and continue cook an additional 2-3 minutes. 
10. Stir in the paprika and bacon.
11. Spread the hash out evenly in the pan. Make 4 wells or indents into the hash.
12. Crack an egg into each of the 4 indents.
13. Transfer the pan to the oven and cook until the white of the egg is set and the yolk is still runny, about 10-12 minutes.

title: Baked Mostacciolli
ingredients:
- 1 pound mostaccioli
- 1 Tablespoon olive oil
- 1 pound ground italian sausage mild 
- 4 cloves fresh garlic minced
- 3 cups (28oz) marinara
- 15 ounces whole milk ricotta cheese
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1 Tablespoon italian seasoning
   - basil, oregeno, rosemary, thyme
- 1 large egg
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 1/4 cup parsley
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook the mostaccioli in boiling salted water according to the package instructions until it is al dente. Drain the water from the pasta and set it aside.
3. In a dutch oven or large skillet, add the olive oil and heat it over medium heat on the stovetop.
4. Add the Italian sausage and cook for 3-4 minutes, while breaking up the sausage with a spoon or spatula, until it is browned.
5. Add in the minced garlic, cook for 1 more minute, while stirring, and remove off of the heat.
6. Add the cooked and drained mostaccioli pasta along with the Italian gravy and stir to combine.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ricotta and mozzarella cheeses, Italian seasoning and the egg. Stir until everything is well combined.
8. Spread half of the pasta mixture in an even later into a 9x13 baking dish. Drop the ricotta cheese mixture in spoonfuls over the top of the pasta, covering it as much as possible. Spread the remaining pasta mixture over the top of the ricotta cheese layer.
9. Sprinkle the top of the pasta with the parmesan cheese and cover the dish tightly in foil.
10. Bake the mostaccioli in the preheated oven for 40 minutes. Remove the foil and bake uncovered for 5-10 minutes to brown the cheese.
notes:
- Cook the pasta al dente so it doesn't get mushy when it's baked in the sauce.
- Bake the dish covered so the pasta doesn't dry out.
- Flip on the broiler for a couple of minutes to finish browning it, if desired.

title: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients:
- 1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree
- 4 eggs
- 1 cup vegetable oil
- ⅔ cup water
- 3 cups white sugar
- 3 ½ cups all-purpose flour
- 2 teaspoons baking soda
- 1 ½ teaspoons salt
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg
- ½ teaspoon ground cloves
- ¼ teaspoon ground ginger
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9x5 inch loaf pans.
2. In a large bowl, mix together pumpkin puree, eggs, oil, water and sugar until well blended. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves and ginger. Stir the dry ingredients into the pumpkin mixture until just blended. Pour into the prepared pans.
3. Bake for about 50 minutes in the preheated oven. Loaves are done when toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
